skills.skill: Design and Implementation of Security and Controls
Regulatory Concerns in Oracle Cloud Environments

duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver Oracle Cloud Applications Security & Controls implementations and Risk Management Cloud (RMC) modules
Assessment, design, and implementation of Security and Controls
Full life cycle implementations including Design, Configure Test and Deploy phase
Integration with identity products for enabling SSO
Strong project management and organizational skills

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Computer Engineering, or related discipline (Master's preferred)
